item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This is the start of my blogs that will document a variety of things: From the servers I stand up to the scripts that I write and the many networks I create. While this may be the first blog entry, this is not my first entry into the homelabbing space. My first entry into homelabbing was in 2020, prior to the start of Covid. I plan to start backfilling blog entries for past milestones… So this won’t entirely contain new things.
